menu.label: Possible factors
menu.prompt: What are five possible factors or reasons? Do not provide a numbered list. Separate each point with a dash (-). Put each item in a separate row.

menu.label: Solutions
menu.prompt: What can I do / what are five possible solutions to improve the situation? Do not provide a numbered list. Separate each point with a dash (-). Put each item in a separate row.

menu.label: Exercises
menu.prompt: Provide five explicit exercises I can do by myself. Do not provide a numbered list. Separate each point with a dash (-). Put each item in a separate row.

menu.label: Daily routine
menu.prompt: Provide three facts that help me improving my daily routine in regard to the context. Do not provide a numbered list. Separate each point with a dash (-). Put each item in a separate row.

menu.label: Professional help
menu.prompt: Where can I get professional help?

menu.label: Explain
menu.prompt: Please explain the context in more detail.
